data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kani-Keli, Mayotte.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kani-Keli, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Kani-Keli, Mayotte find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kani-Keli, Mayotte the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kani-Keli.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Kani-Keli.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kani-Keli, Mayotte.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Kani-Keli prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
